extra.enrollment_requirement:
PREREQUISITES    MUSC 351/3.0 or MUSC 354/6.0. 
NOTE    students must submit a portfolio of compositions to the School by the last day of classes in the Winter Term. Admission is determined through evaluation of portfolios by a Faculty jury.

basic.description: A continuation of MUSC 351*, MUSC 354. Enrolment is limited.
basic.subject: MUSC
basic.title: Acoustic Composition
